Driving Other Cars Endorsement
features.longDescription: The cover provided is outlined in the Driving Other Cars section of the Policy Booklet for you to drive private motor cars other than your vehicle. It only applies if your certificate of insurance shows that you may drive other private motor cars, you still own your vehicle (or if you are still its main driver and you told us that someone else owns your vehicle when you insured it with us), you are over 25 years of age and your occupation has no connection with the motor trade or other transport related employment. This cover does not allow use to secure the release of a motor vehicle which has been seized by, or on behalf of, any government or public authority. If you are regularly using someone else's car, you must add yourself as a named driver on their policy, as Driving Other Cars should only be used for emergencies.
